Method Detail

run

public void run()

segAndMeasure

public boolean segAndMeasure(ij.ImagePlus imp0,
                             ij.ImagePlus imp1)
Three different methods for segmentation of dots, then measure dot-dot distance time course.
currently,
    1. automatic threshold adjustment coupled with 3Dobject counter is used.
    2. using trained data and trainable segmentation
    3. using segmentation module of particle tracker 3D (not implemented yet).

Parameters:
imp0 - channel 1 4D stack
imp1 - channel 2 4D stack
Returns:

storeParticleInfoInObj4D

public void storeParticleInfoInObj4D(java.lang.String particles,
                                     java.util.Vector<Object4D> obj4dv,
                                     java.lang.String chnum)
Stores particle parameters
  • centroid
  • coordinates
  • moments
  • scores
output from particle3D plugin (type of String) are stored in Object4D array.
Object4D is an extended class of Object3D with time point fields and methods.

Parameters:
particles: - String variable exported from particle3D plugin
obj4dv - Vector to store all detected particles
chnum - String indicating the name of channel

createZprojTimeSeries

public ij.ImagePlus createZprojTimeSeries(ij.ImagePlus imp,
                                          int zframes,
                                          int tframes)
Z projection of 4D stack, each time point projected to 2D.
this might not be usefule these days as native z-projection supports 4D.

Parameters:
imp: - 4D stack ImagePlus
zframes: - number of z slices
tframes: - number of time points.
Returns:

segmentaitonByObjectSize

public ij.ImagePlus segmentaitonByObjectSize(ij.ImagePlus imp)
Segmentation of Dots using automatic threshold level coupled with 3D Object Counter processes 3D stack from each time point separately.

Parameters:
imp: - gray scale 4D stack
Returns:
ImagePlus: duplicated and then processed ImagePlus (binary image)

initializeThresholdLevel

public int initializeThresholdLevel(ij.ImagePlus imp,
                                    int cutoff_upperArea)
Initializes the threshold value of 3D stack with dark background
  • 1. z-projection by maximum intensity
  • 2. get histogram of z-projection
  • 3. then find a pixel value that the upper area of histogram becomes larger than setting value

tried using Shanbhag autothreshold but later suppressed.

Parameters:
imp - grayscale 3D stack
cutoff_upperArea - pixel area of upper part of histogram
Returns:

ThresholdAdjusterBy3Dobj

public double ThresholdAdjusterBy3Dobj(ij.ImagePlus imp,
                                       int initTh,
                                       int thadj_volmin,
                                       int thadj_volmax,
                                       int thadj_nummin,
                                       int thadj_nummax)
Explore different threshold levels to find out an optimum threshold level for segmenting 3D dots.

updates
  • 20101117 added a line to suppress error messages from Counter3D when no 3D objects were found.

Parameters:
imp - gray scale 3D stack
initTh - initial level of threshold to start with exploration
thadj_volmin -
thadj_volmax -
thadj_nummin -
thadj_nummax -
Returns:
optimized threshold level for segmentation of 3D dots.

dotLinker

Object4D[][] dotLinker(java.util.Vector<Object4D> obj4Dch0,
                       java.util.Vector<Object4D> obj4Dch1,
                       int tframes)
Link objects in two channels

assumes that there is only one or two pairs.
Picks up largest and/or nearest particle first.
TODO in one case, dots in different daughter cells were linked. This should be avoided.
